title: System Design Level 10 â€” Chat / Messaging System
intro: This level uses a chat/messaging system design to combine multiple concepts.
points: Clarify 1-1 vs group chat requirements, message ordering, delivery guarantees.
Choose protocols (HTTP for APIs, WebSocket/long polling for realtime).
Plan for storing messages and conversation metadata.
Consider presence/online status, typing indicators (at concept level).
Handle scaling, persistence, and eventual consistency between online clients.
